item.title: PowerCLI cannot be installed or updated because the authenticode signature of the file error
item.description: On a new Windows Server 2022 VM I tried to install a fresh copy of VMware.PowerCLI (13.0.0) with the following PowerShell command: Install-Module VMware.PowerCLI -Scope CurrentUser The following error occurred: PackageManagement\Install-Package : The module ‘VMware.VimAutomation.License’ cannot be installed or updated because the authenticode signature of the file ‘VMware.VimAutomation.License.cat’ is not valid.
